title: ➼Bright Mission Hill Studio Available 9/1!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'Rent: $2,100 / Month', 'Beds: 0', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Cat Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Bright Mission Hill Studio Featuring Hardwood Floors, High Ceilings, Fantastic Natural Light, Updated Appliances, an Eat In Kitchen, and Laundry Onsite.', 'Right in Mission Hill steps away from Huntington Ave, the Green Line, MCPHS, HSPH, MassArt, Wentworth, New England Conservatory, Simmons, Northeastern, and much more!', 'Video Tour Available!', 'Student OK', 'Available September!', 'Utilities: Heat and Hot Water Included (Tenant Pays Electricity)', "Move in Costs: First Month's Rent, Security Deposit, and Broker Fee (No Last Month's Rent Upfront)", 'Contact me via email!', 'Crew Fitzpatrick', 'CFB Real Estate powered by Keller Williams', 'Rentals @ CFBRealestate .', 'com', 'Thanks for checking out my listing.', "I would love to work with you and find you a fantastic apartment, I offer Boston's largest personalized video database for ease of access!", 'To confirm availability for this unit and to see other great available listings please email me!', 'Bus: 41 Centre St @ Gardner St (0.55 mi)', 'Bus: 14 Heath St @ S Huntington Ave (0.62 mi)', 'Bus: 22 Tremont St @ Roxbury Crossing Station (0.43 mi)', 'Tram: E Brigham Circle (0.07 mi)', 'Bus: 39 Huntington Ave @ Wigglesworth St (0.06 mi)', 'Bus: 28 Malcolm X Blvd @ Tremont St (0.49 mi)', 'Subway: Orange Line Roxbury Crossing (0.40 mi)', 'Bus: 66 Tremont St @ Saint Alphonsus St (0.14 mi)', 'Bus: 47 Ave Louis Pasteur @ Longwood Ave (0.21 mi)', 'Bus: 60 Brookline Ave @ Deaconess Rd (0.39 mi)', 'Bus: 9 Louis Prang St @ Evans Way (0.33 mi)', 'Bus: Green Line D Shuttle Brookline Ave @ Longwood Ave (0.39 mi)', 'Tram: D Longwood (0.62 mi)', 'Contact me via email!', 'Crew Fitzpatrick', 'CFB Real Estate powered by Keller Williams', 'Rentals @ CFBRealestate .', 'com']
